title: Microsoft encarta 1994 (PC)
brief_description: An interactive learning resource with text of the Funk & Wagnalls New Encyclopedia, sound, images, animation, video clips, maps, interactive charts, Timeline, atlas and knowledge adventure game. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Multimedia PC or compatible PC with 386SX or higher processor; audio board; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 2.5 Mb of available hard disk space; VGA or higher reolution monitor; CD-ROM drive; Microsoft Windows 3.1 or later; MD-DOS 3.1 or later.
